name: Cyberball 77
description:
The game is a wave-based shooter, where the player controls a robot ball, and the enemies follow a similar theme. The art style was intended to be sci-fi, and a cross between Star Wars & Tron.

There are 25 waves to complete, and your goal is to survive them all.

Credits
